About me

My name is Atis Ozols and I am a year 3 student of the University of Latvia.

A lot of time is spent on the road every day, getting from point A to point B. It is also the time, when I plan my schedule and think about all my upcoming events. The days go by so quickly, I rarely notice the places that I pass by every day. This assignment gave me the opportunity to do so.
